role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that performs miscellaneous desktop workstation related tasks
role_description_full_overview: This role is essentially the place where all desktop-specific tasks that are substantial enough for their own role are placed.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that performs miscellaneous desktop workstation related tasks.
